message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for a product worth at least $12,000 to me. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product is quite high to you, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. This is my final offer.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $8,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,500, considering your interest in the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I must stick to my maximum budget of $8,000. I hope this offer is acceptable to you.
